A6739.description: 'I've read so many poems. I should write some myself.' The bird aside chirps, seemingly to encourage her.

A6771.description: She saw the tears of corpses, the smiles of bones, and she will see the birth of the new lord.

A7128.name: People's Support

A7264.description: Golden creation period came. Mia created many profound works and made her mark in the art circle.

A7268.description: They explored and built a special art paradise. Their gorgeous works reflected their life experiences.

A7346.description: Blood-stained lily withered, looking like irredeemable sins. Perhaps a new beginning can only be found at an end...

A7467.description: Good luck favors kind people. Undine won the dwarves’ friendship by solving the problem of flood with elf magic.

A7552.description: In the restaurant of Lotti, two fried toast with butter will give you enough energy for a whole morning.

A7560.description: Do not delay the treatment because you fear the dentist. Check your teeth regularly to keep them healthy!

A7831.name: In My Heart

A7843.name: Starlight Lady
A7843.description: From others, she knew that the young man had an accident and could not remember things well since then.

A7857.name: Direction of Grace
A7857.description: Clients kept coming, and within a few years, she had opened a number of stores, each with distinctive style.

A7862.name: Soulmate
A7862.description: The girl would often share her heart with these adorable bees, her intimate friends.

A7889.name: Breath of Fate
A7889.description: A powerful witch, hard to win even when he's healthy, but here she is, kind and considerate.

A8136.name: Soft Cashmere

A8146.name: Sugar Snowflake
A8146.description: A villager told Shebel that Christmas has long been forgotten in her memory.

A8189.description: The toys in childhood are often hidden in some corners that you never know. It's like a naughty kid's smile.

A8191.name: Yellow Caterpillar

A8224.name: Spring Butterfly
A8224.description: Butterflies flap their wings through the flowers and linger in this colorful sea of spring.

A8228.name: Winter Breeze
A8228.description: The raging wind rolls up the remaining leaves of autumn. The first snow announces the coming of winter.

A8229.name: Autumn Elegy
A8229.description: Nothing can stop my love for you. Even death can’t separate you and me.

A8241.name: Immortal Childhood
A8241.description: Take it easy. Every year there are lucky people chosen to board the train for a dream trip.

A8358.name: Sweet Temptation
A8358.description: On their 18th birthday, they buy a small cake with the money they have gathered.

A8460.name: Celestial Lake
A8460.description: The deer passes by the lake shore, where the orchids are blooming. What a beautiful dream!

A8485.name: Starry Embrace
A8485.description: Some are relieved by death. Others earn lasting fame through it. She gently takes these souls away for a rest.

A8494.name: Fleeting Years
A8494.description: The road she came from is already out of reach. Without noticing, she’s spent 4 years amid the dream-like scenery.

A8519.name: Magnificent and Enchanting
A8519.description: Love can hurt people and rituals can be confinement. She hides her grievances and looks forward to the next spring.

A8549.name: Reunion
A8549.description: The tiny yellow flower... is swaying amidst a riot of color. She couldn't help but pick it with careful fingers.

A8554.name: Reunion · Berth
A8554.description: The miraculous reunion inspires her. She makes the soft fabric into flowers more vivid than the ones in her dream.

A8570.name: Blooming Rose
A8570.description: If this burning feeling is love, she is ready to burn herself to ashes. One night, she finally cuts that rose off.

A8593.name: Poolside Maiden
A8593.description: She lifts it and feeds it dew with a leaf. Seconds later, the sparrow regains its vitality and flies away.

A8610.name: Sunlight Green Vine
A8610.description: Aoi went around with Chromatic Grass, hoping to save dying greenery in the city. People feel touched and join her.

A8615.name: Poetry Of Travel
A8615.description: There are traces of the little master growing up, from a little child learning to speak to a young girl dressing the dolls.

A8666.name: Time Cracks
A8666.description: The stray child gets a leaf from home, the separated lover a handwritten letter, and the traveler a plush bear...

A8700.name: Intellectual Beauty
A8700.description: Eun-jung is getting thinner as she keeps working day and night to look for a new theme for the next issue.

A8733.name: Ultra Hamburger
A8733.description: Made with pickled cucumber, tomatoes, and juicy steak combined with milky cheese, it is both nutritious and tasty.

A8737.name: Giant Hamburger
A8737.description: Made with lettuce, teriyaki chicken, mayo, and sesame, it's too tender and tasty for you to resist.

A8769.name: Familiar Warmth
A8769.description: White marks an 'X' on one of the planets on the screen. It is the twentieth planet she has explored.

A8772.name: Familiar Warmth · Gorgeous
A8772.description: Every trek is a gamble, but every generation of life explorers sends back information to Nova without hesitation.

A8775.name: Familiar Warmth · Epic
A8775.description: The journey is near its end, and it has become a valuable experience for White. A teacher like Deah is rare!

A8778.name: Familiar Warmth · Flame
A8778.description: They know this gravitational field is similar to their home planet's. This could be the miracle they've been seeking.

A8815.name: Warm Rabbit Fur
A8815.description: She's been to the land full of surprise and joy, which offsets the disappointment of not seeing magical animals.

A8837.name: Attractive Figure
A8837.description: People only care about her wealth. As she now has solid social status and business strength, her plan goes well.

A8929.name: Moonlight Veil
A8929.description: When the day is over and the night falls, she starts to recall those innocent and pure moments in the past.

A8933.name: Moonlight Veil · Twilight
A8933.description: Melodious tunes flow out of the record player. Tina is frolicking about, chasing the shadow of a flower.

A8937.name: Moonlight Veil · Frost
A8937.description: As she grew up, Ina decided to find a path of her own. She refused the plans her Mom laid for her, and left the mansion.

A8969.name: Sky Traveler
A8969.description: In a small village at the edge of the continent lived a young girl who had saved countless lives in the midst of war.

A8979.name: Dark Age
A8979.description: She brings nightmares, but also endless silence. People see their true selves, stripped of desires and paint.

A9051.name: Shining Venus
A9051.description: With a balance beam, the performer can present thrilling moves on the high-wire, making audience nervous.

A9077.name: Enchanting Ring Bell
A9077.description: It says that taming is about building a connection. Xiaoqiu once wonders if she tamed Shiba, or Shiba tamed her.

A9081.name: Enchanting Ring Bell · Winter
A9081.description: Late at night, Sheriff sneaks out of the house. And at this time, an assault team has gathered secretly in the fields.

A9107.name: Transparent Mint
A9107.description: Minty soda, and ice cream store under the colored umbrella are simple but wonderful memory of summer.

A9161.name: Fantasism
A9161.description: Angels and children get along extraordinarily well. Innocent souls are always attracted to each other.

A9168.name: Sigh of Rose
A9168.description: The devil weaves in and out of the crowd. As long as there's desire in people's hearts, her rose will never wither.

A9216.name: Heartbeat Signal
A9216.description: Sheeran first set foot on a racing track when she was eight. She immediately fell in love with this furious sport.

A9453.name: Light and Dark
A9453.description: Instead of becoming the center of attention, I admire those unnamed figures working in the shadows to contribute.

A9457.name: Light and Dark · Gorgeous
A9457.description: The standard-issue collar is apparently made of a special material, and it's really fluffy!

A9461.name: Light and Dark · Epic
A9461.description: The special fluffy collar is able to adjust our body temperature to keep us alive even in extreme conditions.

A9465.name: Real and Unreal
A9465.description: Every nation has a bright side and a dark side. This nation definitely has an underground world full of danger.

A9469.name: Light and Shade
A9469.description: I will become one of the unsung heroes working in the shadows to protect my nation.

A9490.name: Burning Flames
A9490.description: As the Fox rids the Prince of his obsession with roses’ whispers, the wind blowing across the plain sounds musical.

A9554.name: Chivalrous Hunter
A9554.description: She sometimes joins others in looking for treasures, then giving them away to the poor that are starving.

A9564.name: Chaotic Territory
A9564.description: There is plenty of fish on land, and she thrives in challenging them. The stronger they are, the more excited she is.

A9651.name: Luxurious Thoughts
A9651.description: Power means everything. All the defeated subordinates of the Devil King are branded with the eternal mark of slavery.

A9754.name: Floating Snow
A9754.description: Hurriedly putting on her scarf, she walks into the courtyard, where the white plum in the corner is emitting fragrance.

A9762.name: Hidden Poems
A9762.description: As she grows up, she gets more confused. And there are more things that she can't do anything about.

A9768.name: Full of Surprise
A9768.description: 'Don't worry! It can also be made into delicious persimmon jam.' The young girl comforts the little civet cat.

A9831.name: Star Sea Song
A9831.description: 'Anyway, I hope that in the future, if you are reading these words, all your wishes will come true! Just like mine!'

A9961.name: Snowstorm Test
A9961.description: At the end of the winding road is a dismal village where the temperature is very low.

A9971.name: Surprise Party
A9971.description: Ina took to the streets, looking for adults who were ashamed to write down their wishes.

Z10027.name: Shared Temperature
Z10027.description: Are you also pursuing your dreams? I wish we can always be there for each other. However, we have to learn to grow up.

Z10032.name: Shared Temperature - Maple
Z10032.description: Will you get tired of chasing dreams? I wish we could support each other, but we need to go ahead even if we're alone.

Z10037.name: Shared Temperature - Tan
Z10037.description: Joya is very sad when Achi comes up to her, 'You know your wish will surely come true?'

Z10042.name: Shared Temperature - Frost
Z10042.description: She knows that Joya is more afraid of parting, so she finds out the stars, 'You know? Your wish will surely come true.'

Z10054.name: Misplaced Redemption
Z10054.description: Gradually, the black lake returned to calm, and this place turned into a sacred garden of prayer for well-being.

Z10091.name: Earthy Happiness
Z10091.description: Date pastry, mung bean cake, small twist... Those are her favorites. However, she still covets the sugar-coated haws.

Z10191.name: Deep into the Flowers
Z10191.description: Li went around the capital to inquire about Wanhua's whereabouts, but everyone was silent about it.

Z10229.name: Encounter
Z10229.description: When finding the garden hidden in the suburb area, he is attracted by the gloom in the tranquil place.

Z10880.name: Sincere Salute
Z10880.description: The stores are filled with souvenirs, the bearded shopkeepers gave personal demonstrations, preaching green fashions.

Z10891.name: Tender Care
Z10891.description: My father’s scarf has a retro plaid pattern and feels soft. It is just like himself, sober out and gentle inside.

Z10921.name: Weave Glory
Z10921.description: You're grounded!' Lina said coldly to Tini, 'I will keep your broom until you successfully make the 'Witch's Secret Potion'!'

Z11064.name: Inspiration
Z11064.description: Wylda is very interested in Amina's magic lamp. The patterns on it give her a lot of sewing inspirations.

Z11203.description: Sona hesitates and doesn't use up the final bear sticker, so she says goodnight to Mr. Bear and goes to sleep.

Z11209.description: The princess and the girl promise to jump from the mountain together and fly with their umbrellas when the cabin is done.

Z11228.name: Broken Times
Z11228.description: She stumbles alone and the scene around her changes to a familiar street, and the girl next to her laughs.

Z11291.name: Dawny Fog
Z11291.description: She cleansed the flames of hell and no longer contains evil, but cannot shake off the name of the fallen angel.

Z11376.description: 06 tells 07 that their job is to bring joy to people, and it doesn't matter if it is programmed.

Z11413.name: Silken Demure
Z11413.description: The dubious looks from her family are shackles that stopped Rika from thinking about the carp or the outside world.

Z11711.name: Fading Oath

Z11719.name: Unbroken Fate

Z11751.name: Mid-Autumn Night

Z11874.name: Cloud in Prosperity - Gorgeous
Z11874.description: Pololo leaves with many regrets. She recognizes who she is and leaves the school with her dreams.

Z11878.name: Cloud in Prosperity - Rare
Z11878.description: Pololo also dances a little when she doesn't work. This isn't a performance — it is only for relaxation.

Z11880.name: Cloud in Prosperity - Dusk
Z11880.description: Pololo realizes she almost repeated her parents' mistake by forcing her own daughter onto a specific path.

Z12064.name: Snow Fairy Tale
Z12064.description: Yesterday's snow melted. The morning breeze brought the smell of spring. The seasons change like in all fairy tales.

Z12161.name: Uncertain Anticipations
Z12161.description: She experienced long nights of rainfall and days of hope with her friends. She is always full of motivation.

Z12190.name: Poetry Surprise

Z12224.name: Tender Care
Z12224.description: The snow rabbits all wake up and talk about the news. A visitor is arriving on such a dangerous night?

Z12287.name: Milk Foam Latte
Z12287.description: Press the button on the coffee machine and get foamy milk. Hopefully, this hot drink can bring comfort to someone.

Z12309.name: Snow in the Wind
Z12309.description: carriages and horses entering the city are like rivers. There are firecrackers everywhere. The streets are dressed in red.

Z12380.name: Time of Flowers Weaving
Z12380.description: Spring is often concerned for her sister's actions. She decides not to scold but communicate softly.

Z12383.name: Leisurely Happiness
Z12383.description: When the sisters grow tired and return to the Pavilion, Spring would appear to wipe off sweat and share cakes.

Z12856.name: Gentle Courtesy
Z12856.description: There are various magical creatures here, ranging from cute snowflake hares to giant armored wolves!

Z12932.name: Perfect Manners
Z12932.description: A pretty girl becomes a regular at the coffee shop. No one knows what the owner and the journalist talk about.

Z12959.name: Divine Promise
Z12959.description: Noah almost never stayed in one place for long. His gaze was fixed on anything that he found intriguing.

Z13011.name: Torch of Fire
Z13011.description: The Goddess turned the uncontrolled, furious light into a stable light source. And it became the origin of all.

Z13296.name: Fate Manifestation
Z13296.description: Temple was lit up and the priestess prayed. They didn't know if they should march as they were running low on wealth.

Z13321.name: Spring Whispers
Z13321.description: Rosaline was crying in the forest at night when she suddenly heard sobs in the distance. Was someone else also crying?

Z13336.name: Newborn Feather
Z13336.description: Lydia woke up early in the morning and posted up the poster she had drawn. Soon, people gathered up before it.

Z13351.name: Weightless Heart
Z13351.description: Her heart is pounding, and she breathes faster. She can't wait for that figure to show up so she can confess her love.

Z13365.name: First Wish
Z13365.description: From time to time, Hertha would sing in the clouds, and her voice would spread across the world in the night wind.

Z13576.name: Hot Presale
Z13576.description: Just as Giovanna predicted, the starlight earrings and ruby necklace designed by Heartwish became the latest fashion.

Z13709.name: Pavilion of Verdure
Z13709.description: Since then, she would make jokes about how her mentor's leaves hadn't grown much for so many years.

Z13727.name: Tide Chaser
Z13727.description: The ship cleaves a way through turbulent waves, as she steers it confidently in the face of challenges.

Z13863.name: Sweet Concord
Z13863.description: Her mother's encouragement and friends' envious looks were nothing compared to the moment she bought the toy.

Z13909.name: Temporal Grandeur
Z13909.description: Rivers coursed through Aram, where sea creatures swam freely within, and mermaids lived among humans.

Z14027.name: Warm Corner
Z14027.description: As design guides fill her desktop, her memo-filled books about pets are pushed to the side but never covered in dust.

Z14037.name: Symphony of Gears
Z14037.description: In deep caverns she found clean spring water with green orbs floating above, driving away the darkness.

Z14123.name: Wild Berries
Z14123.description: Ella wanted to return, but the squirrel ran into the depths of the forest and picked some berries for her.

Z14137.name: Sole Star
Z14137.description: What were humans? And what was the curse? Ella knew nothing, except that she wanted to stay with Nehemia.

Z14182.name: Melancholic Moon
Z14182.description: A disciple hesitates, 'Although we've sent out invitation letters, what if no one comes? What should we do then?'

Z14378.name: Circle of Life
Z14378.description: Even as Satiel grew up, she still trod between the deer pack and the village, almost like a bridge connecting them.

Z14459.name: Silent Cosmos
Z14459.description: Matina had a knack for creating drinks from seemingly unrelated ingredients, often resulting in unforgettable tastes.

Z14465.name: Silent Cosmos - Rose
Z14465.description: I sang with my heart. I didn't care whether it was going to bring me misfortune. I wasn't scared one bit.'

Z14471.name: Silent Cosmos - Fragrant
Z14471.description: It started out well. The leaves were thick, and nobody noticed me hiding just outside the window.'

Z14489.name: First Snow
Z14489.description: When dusk falls, Kiri has a full basket of petals. She waves goodbye to the others and sets off on her way home.

Z14501.name: Joyous Reminiscence
Z14501.description: Jin Meng gasped, she revealed herself and explained what had happened, to which the girl only smiled faintly.

Z14549.name: Slumber Veil
Z14549.description: Those who trace her steps would seek the darkness; for she always stays with those in need and fosters hope in them.

Z14607.name: Lonesome Moon
Z14607.description: Instead of leaving with family, Eric hid in the dark ruins where the moon didn't shine, waiting for the promised time.

Z14643.name: Lotus Rendezvous
Z14643.description: Cloudria rowed under a lotus leaf and saw the man again. She offered freshly picked lotus seeds as an apology.

Z14726.name: Chord Focus
Z14726.description: What's a perfect ending? Everyone has their own answer. People leave the theater, imagining what works for them.

Z14794.name: Dazzling Star
Z14794.description: When asked who designed the dress, the owner waved at the center of the dance floor and gently called 'Moria.'

Z14810.name: Lambent Heart
Z14810.description: One night, Andrea woke up to some rustles on the balcony and an indistinct song drifting inside the room.

Z14822.name: Consonant Echo
Z14822.description: A joyful song wafted out of the window, leaping in the flowing moonlight and adorning the quiet night.

Z14912.name: Frosty Satin
Z14912.description: She lost herself in the waltz of snow, as doves tied a shiny and soft ribbon on her and snow adorned her dress.

Z14969.name: Afternoon Elegance
Z14969.description: When the squirrel climbs down, she will tell how the divine brilliance lights every corner of the world.

Z14998.name: Kiss of Zephyr
Z14998.description: Her presence would light up the room for even the most ordinary ball, as eyes followed her graceful steps.

Z15012.name: Crystal Illusion
Z15012.description: From lifelike animals to dreamy palaces, the princess's magic ice sculptures attracted tourists to the kingdom.

Z15215.name: Lively Party
Z15215.description: Every accessory Cicely wore would always become the trend and make its mark in the history of fashion.

Z15615.name: Distant Yearning
Z15615.description: Olitha learned her grandma's death at the age of 16, and a few days later, she received a letter from her hometown.

Z15815.name: Fuzzy Feeling
Z15815.description: Nikki gently cracks open the chocolate egg brought by the Iron Rose. Inside is a birthday cake adorned with stars.
